original_title: Roy Rogers: Song of the Pioneers
overview: Singing cowpoke Roy Rogers stars in these four vintage Westerns that offer action as well as soothing musical interludes. In Bells of San Angelo, Rogers and Dale Evans catch a group of silver-mine smugglers. In Colorado, Rogers investigates Indian uprisings during the Civil War. In Robin Hood of the Pecos, Rogers organizes a citizens' group against crooked ranchers. And in Young Bill Hickok, Rogers portrays the legendary gunfighter.
title: Roy Rogers: Song of the Pioneers
